name: Orthodox Defense
description:
Orthodox Defense -正統防衛(seitou bouei)-
is a tower defense (TD) type real time strategy (RTS) game for Windows. 
You can download this game for free.

Features:
  • Only mouse operation is supported. But you can use the keyboard for some operations.
  • 36 stages are there.
  • One game is completed in one stage. So you can play one game in a few minutes.
  • 8 types of friend units and 20 types of enemies.
  • No BGMs.
  • Key bindings, GUI layout settings, and SFX volume controls are possible.
  • Very simple & abstract looks.
Game overview and rules:
  • This game is a real-time strategy of the tower defense type. The game progresses in real time. However, you can pause in the game.
  • You must defend the goal point from the invading enemies.
  • Each time the enemy reaches the goal point, lives decreases by a specified amount. Game over when life becomes 0. There is no way to recover lives. The amount of lives to be reduced depends on enemy types.
  • You can install a unit in a blank area on the screen as long as golds (possession money) allows it. After installing the unit, the unit automatically intercepts the enemies. However, each unit has a different effective range, and attacks are only made against enemies who have entered the range. Also, some units have no ability to attack, temporarily lower enemy’s speed, or have the ability to support other units.
  • When units destroy enemies, your money increases. You can install new units and upgrade existing units by spending money. It is also possible to sell unnecessary units.
  • Clearing the selected stage will end the game at that point. You can not take over the score, life, golds to other stages.
  • No matter which stage you select at the beginning of the game, the game will end on that stage. There are no restrictions on the stage selection and you can choose any stage you like from scratch.
Controls:

The default keys used in the game are as follows.

  • OK: Left mouse button.
  • Cancel: Right mouse button.
  • Rotating the unit manually: Mouse wheel. (GUN. LASER. MISSILE, SNIPER only.)
  • Disable/Enable rotation of the unit: Click the unit when Upgrade/Sell button is desplayed. If disabled this, lock mark is indicated on the unit. 
    (GUN. LASER. MISSILE, SNIPER only.)
  • Toggle display of GUI: SPACE key.
  • Toggle display of grid: "G" key.
  • Speed1～3: "1", "2", "3" key.
  • Pause: "P" key.
  • Take screenshot with F12 key. Screenshots will be saved in a specific folder in png format.
  • Toggle fullscreen: ALT + ENTER.

For explanation of the game system & how to play,  please refer to the link below. Official site (en) / Official site (ja)

System Requirements:

OS: Windows 10 x64
Memory: 2 GB
Storage: 100 MB
Network: Not use.
It may work in environments other than above conditions, but I cannot check them. Sorry.

Install:
  1. Unzip the game file in the folder you want. 
  2. Check that the folder "OthodoxDefense" is made.
  3. Congratulations. You completed the mission.
Uninstall:
  1. Basically, it is done just by deleting game folder.  If you want to delete the registry, please read the "readme" text file in the game folder.
